serialize_name.description: This will be the same and are the localization keys whose value will be defined later in en_US.lang with the full key being skinpack.<localization_name>. That value will be the title of the pack. The key will also always be prepended to each individual skin's localization key.

localization_name.description: This will be the same and are the localization keys whose value will be defined later in en_US.lang with the full key being skinpack.<localization_name>. That value will be the title of the pack. The key will also always be prepended to each individual skin's localization key.

skins.description: a collection of definitions, each defining a single skin.

type.description: either free or paid. Non-marketplace partners may have any number of free skins but no paid skins, while marketplace partners may have up to 2 free skins and are able to add paid skins.

geometry.description: the base model this skin is for. geometry.humanoid.customSlim is the Alex model and geometry.humanoid.custom is the Steve model.

localization_name.description: the localization key whose value is defined later in en_US.lang. The value will be the name of the individual skin.

texture.description: the file name for each of the skin textures as they appear in the root of the skin pack.
